summary:
Experienced professional with diverse background in various sectors and functions. From customer service to more specific areas required by the employer. 

During my journey until now I developed a strong set of skills in communication, organization, problem solving and collaboration. Some points like my adaptability and willingness to take on new challenges have allowed me to thrive in dynamic environments and deliver impressive results.

My motivation is the new, the challenge is to acquire knowledge and prosper in everything I set out to do.

projects.title: DIAGNOSIS OF SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT AT THE FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF TOCANTINS CAMPUS GURUPI
projects.description:
This work had as main objective to make a survey of solid waste generated at the Federal University of Tocantins, Campus de Gurupi. Identification of generating sources was carried out through observations and research in the sectors present on campus. The quantitative analysis consisted of the collection of the residues during the days 25 to September 29, 2017, in which they were separated according to their typology, such as: cardboard, aluminum, organic, pruning, among others. Observations were made regarding the collection, packaging, storage and final disposal. After obtaining the data collected, proposals were made for adjustments and improvements for solid waste management. In addition, the generated generated sources comprise the administrative sectors, classrooms, laboratories and areas of common use. The data obtained from the quantitative generation show the organic residues coming from the university restaurant, which represent 75% of the solid residues generated on campus, with final destination for pig feed. Already other common residues are deposited in an open place, exposed to the sun, which are collected by the truck of the City Hall. On-site analyzes have shown that some improvements are needed mainly in the collection, storage and identification. In addition, it is necessary to raise awareness, lectures and actions of environmental education for the students and servers of the campus.
 
Keywords: collection, storage, final destination and waste.

projects.title: POTENTIAL OF MAURITIA FLEXUOSA BIOMASS L NA E Cu Adsorption Aqueous Solutions
projects.description:
RESUME
Currently, studies on adsorption are improving in search of effective and viable alternatives
that can solve problems caused by contaminants such as toxic metals. The process of
adsorption has a great applicability in the removal of these contaminants in effluents. O
objective of this work is to analyze and enable the use of buriti biomass for the removal of copper (II)
in aqueous solutions. Batch tests were carried out with different solutions of CuSO 4 .H 2 O in
1g / L of biomass, at a temperature of 25ºC in 30 minutes of stirring, analyzes were also performed
pH, FTIR, MEV / EDS, PCZ analyzes, granulometry variation analyzes and calculations of
adsorption isotherms. The Langmuir adsorption model fits the data very well
experimental data obtained for the Cu (II) species. The value of q max. obtained for Cu (II) reflect the
load capacity of these metallic species by biomass, where the capacity for Cu (II) exhibited
a value of 14.20mg / g. With that it was observed that the biomass of Buriti is a viable alternative for
Cu (II) decontamination.
Keywords: Biomass; Copper (II); Adsorption;

profile_positions.description:
A sales support person provides assistance to sales teams to help them meet their goals. It includes: 
-Order processing and sales order management
-Sales data management and reporting
-Coordination of sales activities and events
-Preparation of sales materials and proposals
-Collaborating with other departments to ensure customer needs are met

A sales support person is responsible for ensuring that the sales team is organized, efficient, and successful.
